article.title: Chapter 1 - The Top Most Article of the South!
article.blurb: Top most article with information about HTML formatting info.
article.story:
Top most article BOLD TEXT can be enter using standard HTML tags, also ITALICS also works as HTML tags LINKS also work as HTML text
  • Only unnumbered bullets!!
  • It's a limitiation of Flash/Flex HTML Engine
  • But, you can at least have bullets
    • Morbi fringilla lobortis turpis.
